TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NgramExtractingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class NgramExtractingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: Produces a bag of counts of ngrams(sequences of consecutive values of length 1-n) in a given vector of keys. It does so by building a dictionary of ngrams and using the id in the dictionary as the index in the bag.
